mapper.select: SELECT A.SITE_CD , A.SITE_NM , A.SITE_ENG_NM , A.SITE_ADDR , A.SITE_ENG_ADDR , A.TEL_NO , A.FAX_NO , A.SITE_INFO01 , A.SITE_INFO02 , A.SITE_INFO03 , A.SITE_INFO04 , A.SITE_INFO05 , A.SITE_INFO06 , A.SITE_INFO07 , A.SITE_INFO08 , A.SITE_INFO09 , A.SITE_INFO10 , A.SYS_ACCESS_YN , A.LOGIN_YN , A.USE_YN , A.TEMPLATE_CD , A.SITE_LOGO , A.SITE_META , B.DOMAIN FROM COM_SITE A, COM_DOMAIN B WHERE A.SITE_CD = B.SITE_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DOMAIN = #{domain}

SELECT COUNT(SITE_CD) FROM COM_SITE WHERE 1=1
AND SITE_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue} , '%')
AND SITE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue} , '%')

SELECT SITE_CD , SITE_NM , SITE_ENG_NM , SITE_ADDR , SITE_ENG_ADDR , TEL_NO , FAX_NO , SITE_INFO01 , SITE_INFO02 , SITE_INFO03 , SITE_INFO04 , SITE_INFO05 , SITE_INFO06 , SITE_INFO07 , SITE_INFO08 , SITE_INFO09 , SITE_INFO10 , INPT_ID , INPT_IP , INPT_DTTM , MODI_ID , MODI_IP , MODI_DTTM , SYS_ACCESS_YN , LOGIN_YN , USE_YN , TEMPLATE_CD FROM COM_SITE WHERE 1=1
AND SITE_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue} , '%')
AND SITE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue} , '%')
ORDER BY INPT_DTTM ASC, SITE_CD ASC

SELECT SITE_CD , SITE_NM , SITE_ENG_NM , SITE_ADDR , SITE_ENG_ADDR , TEL_NO , FAX_NO , SITE_INFO01 , SITE_INFO02 , SITE_INFO03 , SITE_INFO04 , SITE_INFO05 , SITE_INFO06 , SITE_INFO07 , SITE_INFO08 , SITE_INFO09 , SITE_INFO10 , INPT_ID , INPT_IP , INPT_DTTM , MODI_ID , MODI_IP , MODI_DTTM , SYS_ACCESS_YN , LOGIN_YN , USE_YN , TEMPLATE_CD , SITE_LOGO , SITE_META FROM COM_SITE WHERE SITE_CD = #{siteCd}
SELECT SITE_CD , SITE_NM FROM COM_SITE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY INPT_DTTM ASC, SITE_CD ASC
